channel.title: Comments on: The Bitcoin Podcast #202: Roger Ver

item.title: By: lol
item.dc:creator: lol
item.description: The only thing worse for crypto than Roger Ver is Craig Wright. Terrible people. Terrible voice in crypto. Fade to obscurity please.
item.content:encoded: The only thing worse for crypto than Roger Ver is Craig Wright. Terrible people. Terrible voice in crypto. Fade to obscurity please.

item.title: By: Red
item.dc:creator: Red
item.description: Hey Guys, thanks for a great episode. A little about me. I invested in early 2011. I have been a fan of Roger Ver since the beginning. I still am. I think he's right about everything. Block size limits are stupid. Long live BCH. Peace.
item.content:encoded: Hey Guys, thanks for a great episode. A little about me. I invested in early 2011. I have been a fan of Roger Ver since the beginning. I still am. I think he’s right about everything. Block size limits are stupid. Long live BCH. Peace.
